titles.title: Family Stability and Opportunity Vouchers Act of 2023
Family Stability and Opportunity Vouchers Act of 2023

A bill to authorize a new type of housing choice voucher to help achieve the goals of ending homelessness among families with children, increasing housing opportunities, and improving life outcomes of poor children.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Family Stability and Opportunity Vouchers Act of 2023
This bill establishes a voucher program through which public housing agencies (PHAs) shall offer support services to help families who have children and are unstably housed, live in an area of concentrated poverty, or are at risk of being displaced from an opportunity area for children move to areas with access to high-performing schools or high-quality childcare and early education. The Department of Housing and Urban Development must provide assistance to PHAs on a competitive basis to implement the program.
